turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about All-Ireland Senior Hurling Championship.
turn.1: What teams participated in the 2018 All-Ireland Senior Hurling Championship?
turn.2: In all five teams participated: Clare (Garraunboy Smith O'Briens), Galway (Meelick), Kilkenny (Tullaroan) Tipperary (Thurles) and Wexford (Castlebridge).
turn.3: Who played in the first championship?
turn.4: Galway and Wexford contested the very first championship match on Saturday 2 July 1887.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Postponements, disqualifications, objections, withdrawals and walkovers were regular occurrences during the initial years of the championship.
turn.7: When was the first championship played?
turn.8: The inaugural All-Ireland final took place on 1 April 1888, with Tipperary defeating Galway to take the title.
turn.9: When was the first championship played?
turn.10: The provincial championships were introduced in 1888 in Munster, Leinster, Connacht and Ulster on a knock-out basis.
turn.12: The winners of the provincial finals participated in the All-Ireland semi-finals.
